expertise: Aboriginal And Torres Strait Islander Languages

interest: Australian Aboriginal languages; language documentation and description; morphosyntax; semantics; pragmatics; tense-aspect-modality; information structure; narrative structure; linguistic typology; language revitalisation and maintenance; lexicography
ANU.biography: I completed my PhD at ANU & U.Paris in 2020. My thesis Temporal, aspectual and modal expression in Anindilyakwa, the language of the Groote Eylandt Archipelago, Australia provides an empirically driven and theoretically informed examination of temporal, aspectual and modal expression in Anindilyakwa, an underdescribed Gunwinyguan language of the Groote Eylandt archipelago, north-east Arnhem Land, Australia.
